entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
